title: EA Cancels Secret Titanfall Game & Nintendo Direct Incoming?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.02.23
description:
Go to http://grammarly.com/KINDAFUNNY to get 20% off when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium.

It's a big news day! Blessing and Tim talk a rumored Nintendo Direct, a secret Titanfall game cancelled, and Wolverine maybe coming next year.
